DESCRIPTOR.LABEL: ENA mutagenesis by carcinogen treatment checklist
DESCRIPTOR.NAME: ENA mutagenesis by carcinogen treatment checklist
DESCRIPTOR.DESCRIPTION: Minimum Information required for reporting samples associated with genomic data, derived from carcinogen induced animal tumours. This minimum metadata standard was developed in collaboration with Duncan Odom lab for the Mouse Liver Cancer Evolution Project.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: Part and developmental stage of organism
FIELD_GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Anatomical and developmental descriptions of the sample site or source material

FIELD.LABEL: tissue_type
FIELD.NAME: tissue_type
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: tissue type from which the sample was obtained

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: Organism characteristics

FIELD.LABEL: sex
FIELD.NAME: sex
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: sex of the organism from which the sample was obtained

FIELD.LABEL: date of birth
FIELD.NAME: date of birth
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Date of birth of subject the sample was derived from.

FIELD.LABEL: date of death
FIELD.NAME: date of death
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Date of death of subject the sample was derived from.

FIELD.LABEL: diagnosis
FIELD.NAME: diagnosis
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation (http://ncicb.nci.nih.gov/xml/owl/EVS/Thesaurus.owl#C15220).

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: Infraspecies information
FIELD_GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Formal and informal infraspecies taxonomic information

FIELD.LABEL: strain
FIELD.NAME: strain
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the strain from which the sample was obtained.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: other

FIELD.LABEL: tumor grading (OBI_0600002)
FIELD.NAME: tumor grading (OBI_0600002)
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Determination of the grade (severity/stage) of a tumor sample, used in cancer biology to describe abnormalities/qualities of tumor cells or tissues. Values can be described by terms from NCI Thesaurus.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: treatment
FIELD_GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Details of a treatment regime with a treatment agent.

FIELD.LABEL: treatment agent
FIELD.NAME: treatment agent
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the treatment agent used.

FIELD.LABEL: treatment dose
FIELD.NAME: treatment dose
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The dose of the treatment agent used.

FIELD.LABEL: treatment date
FIELD.NAME: treatment date
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The date of the treatment applied.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: Reference

FIELD.LABEL: Further Details
FIELD.NAME: Further Details
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Reference details related to a sample in form of an URI.
